CPMAddPackage(
    NAME kangaru
    GITHUB_REPOSITORY gracicot/kangaru # master
    GIT_TAG 0c6ce25546078160008eb7180097337861fa9278
    OPTIONS "KANGARU_INSTALL OFF" "KANGARU_EXPORT OFF" "KANGARU_REVERSE_DESTRUCTION ON"
    EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL YES)

ph_add_library(
    NAME ph_vendor_kangaru
    TYPE INTERFACE
    LINK_LIBRARIES SYSTEM INTERFACE kangaru)
